title: Tommy Leach Signed Glory of Their Times Royalty Check
author: vintagechris

posts.post_title: Tommy Leach Signed Glory of Their Times Royalty Check
posts.post_content:
For sale is a signed Royalty check for the Glory of Their Times book. The check is made out to T206 player Tommy Leach. It is signed by author Lawrence Ritter and also endorsed(signed) by Tommy Leach on the back.

An interesting piece, especially for those who like the book or the T206 set.

$65 delivered.

PM if interested.

SOLD

That would be a sweet bookmark!  Neat check...

Take Care,
Geno
